nodes.text: The Douglas system was a star system located in the Centrality, a sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planet Douglas III.

The Douglas system was named after the famous game hunter Mendel Douglas, who traversed the surface of Douglas III in search of the rare and elusive jackelope, hoping to collect the creature's hide. The explorer was able to catch a jackelope, although he never returned from that particular hunt.
